description:
A group of four sorcerers, the Bravery Quartet, appears in the village and seals the Nemesis`s movements. Seth has never met any other sorcerers besides Alma and is immediately taken with them. Hoping to prove that he can be of use too, Seth asks their leader, Don Bossman (Boss), if he can work with them. Impressed, Boss asks Seth to keep the Nemesis occupied while the quartet evacuates the villagers. And so, Seth faces the powerful Nemesis once again!
Source: crunchyroll
